content: A father's radio, a mother's reassurance - and then, in an instant, darkness and pain. This is life under Israeli attack

title: Oscar Pistorius released on parole after serving nine years for murder
content: Former Paralympic athlete was serving 13-year sentence for Valentine's Day shooting of girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.
contentSnippet: Former Paralympic athlete was serving 13-year sentence for Valentine's Day shooting of girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.

title: Israel launches attacks across Gaza amid spike in regional tensions
content: Health ministry in Gaza says 125 people have been killed and 318 injured in a 24-hour period.

title: North Korea fires artillery towards South’s islands, prompting evacuations
content: South Korea condemns move as 'act of provocation that escalates tension and threatens peace on the Korean Peninsula'.

title: Indian navy intercepts Liberian-flagged vessel hijacked in the Arabian Sea
content: The navy says its commandos boarded the warship to render assistance after the vessel issued a hijacking distress call.

title: Four killed, many injured in two-train collision in Indonesia’s West Java
content: A long-distance train from Indonesia's second-largest city, Surabaya, collided with a commuter train near Bandung.

title: India’s stateless babies: How lawless asylum rules leave refugees in limbo
content: Without a refugee law, India is an uncertain home for new waves of asylum seekers. Will the 2024 election change that?

title: Asia’s business heirs look beyond profits, hoping to escape parents’ shadow

title: Israeli defence minister outlines new phase in Gaza war

title: Russia used North Korean missiles in Ukraine, US says
